name: DTU Bhangra
about: The sole purpose of DTU Bhangra had been to provide opportunity and instruction for aspiring performers. We encourage, advance, and promote the art of Bhangra dancing (Punjabi folk dance) and Punjabi Culture through various performances and competitions, on and off campus, and through workshops. Since the beginning, the team has been working hard towards the stated said goal and has been quiet a success. Team’s agenda has been summarized under the following points: Set a new standard for traditional Bhangra and re-energize the industry. Set a benchmark for future generations and cultivate new talent. Raise awareness and interest of our traditions and culture through our performances and workshops.
recruitment_process: Apply through our form in the bio

name: Team Raftaar
about: Team Raftaar is a team of undergraduate students of Delhi Technological University (formerly DCE) who share a common vision, i.e., to engrain the dynamic concept of Hybrid Electric and Human Powered Vehicles in our day-to-day life and thus, promote sustainable modes of transportation for a better world ahead. For the same, we design a fully Carbon Fiber faired recumbent bicycle to optimise the aerodynamic and drivetrain-related traits which have bolstered our capabilities to achieve speeds over 90 Kmph purely out of human power. This year with a new set of guidelines from ASME e-HPVC the team plans on incorporating the use of electric power and a suspension system to increase rider comfort and reach over 100 Kmph
